TopicTitle: Your First Fifteen Minutes in Kerbal Space Program (video introduction)

Articles.Content:
At the request of friends and coworkers who I have, over the past months, persuaded to buy this game, I have created a brief video covering the very basics of KSP to get people started since the game is currently lacking this kind of basic introduction.

If it proves popular (which seems unlikely) I may go on and do intermediate and advanced videos for things like fuel management, VAB and SPH construction, flight, intercepts, etc.

I like the idea. I'll have to take a look at this later tonight, when my bandwidth restrictions relax a little.

EDIT: And now that I've had the opportunity to watch said video, I have to say that it's very well done. You give a very clear and comprehensive explanation of a number of basic and useful features in a quick and concise video. There are a few things I might have explained a little more thoroughly (though I'd imagine you're saving those for the "Next Fifteen Minutes" video and whatever follows that), but I'd have no misgivings about recommending this video in its current state to a new player myself
